snippet.title: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the gloomy, beautiful world of Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow in this trailer for the upcoming atmospheric, horror-infused, puzzle adventure game. Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow will be available in spring 2023 on PC via Steam. A free demo is available now on Steam. 

Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow tells the touching story of Griffin, a boy who struggles against his inner fears. Join Griffin as he embarks on a journey to face his fears alongside his teddy bear companion Birly. As Griffin learns to confront haunting memories amidst floating castles and enchanted forests, he’ll come to discover the mystery of this newfound world.
